actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the Act of May 26, 1926, (Ch. 401, 44 Stat. 657, 43 U.S.C. 373a) to provide for the appointment of a Commissioner of Water and Power Resources.

summary.text: Replaces the office of Commissioner of Reclamation in the Department of the Interior with that of Commissioner of Water and Power Resources to administer the reclamation of arid lands.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Act of May 26, 1926, (Ch. 401, 44 Stat. 657, 43 U.S.C. 373a) to provide for the appointment of a Commissioner of Water and Power Resources.
